Changelog

Source: NEWS.md

oxthema 0.1.0.9000 (pre-release)

This is a GitHub- and R Universe-only pre-release of the oxthema package. The purpose of this pre-release is to allow for beta testing.


oxthema 0.0.0.9000 (pre-release)

This is a GitHub- and R Universe-only pre-release of the oxthema package. The purpose of this pre-release is to allow for alpha testing.
